name: Kokona / ココナ / 코코나 / 心奈 (Blue Archive)
description:
Sunohara Kokona (Blue Archive)

春原 ココナ (ブルーアーカイブ) / 스노하라 코코나 (블루 아카이브) / 春原心奈 (碧蓝档案)

Usage

Use any or all of these tags to summon Kokona: 1girl, halo, animal ears, orange eyes, long hair, grey hair

For her normal outfit:china dress, vertical-striped dress, white skirt, frilled skirt, off-shoulder, jacket

For her pout expression: pout, pouting, :t, blush

Not all tags may be necessary. Weight 1 works best with most models. You may need to adjust weight when combining with other LoRAs.

NAI / Anything VAE is recommended to avoid issues with color oversaturation.

Refer to https://huggingface.co/khanon/lora-training for other Blue Archive characters, training parameters, and datasets.

modelVersions.name: v1
modelVersions.description:
Initial release.

Note: this is an old model from 2023-01-12 and is not as flexible as my newer models, however it still works pretty well. I'll try to re-train it soon with improved tagging and training parameters so that Kokona can be customized further.

It is recommended that you use only NAI/Anything3.0 VAE to avoid color saturation issues with this model.
